# Of beauty and tomatoes 

Below you can see the correlation between the import value of tomatoes in Germany and the number of cosmetic surgeries world wide. 

## Cosmetic surgeries and tomato import value

::: {.cell hash='04_causality_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_b3e206948b37194798fbc85d36b1876f'}
::: {.cell-output-display}
![](04_causality_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

## Correlation

::: {.cell hash='04_causality_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_51f1303000ab9941c229b2c7151b302f'}

:::

As you can imagine their is no causal link between the two. Nerveless, there is a significant correlation between both variables. The Pearson correlation coefficient is $R = 0.80$. Both samples are normaly distributed.
